sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useState ,useEffect } from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../common/breadcrumb'; import JobFilter from './job-filter'; import { Typeahead } from 'react-bootstrap-typeahead'; import jobDB from '../../data/job/jobDB'; import 'react-bootstrap-typeahead/css/Typeahead.css'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import one from '../../assets/images/job-search/1.jpg'; const JobApply = (props) => { const multiple = false; const location = props.location; const id = location.state?location.state.id:1; const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date(),); const [startDate1, setStartDate1] = useState(new Date(),); const [startDate2, setStartDate2] = useState(new Date(),); const [startDate3, setStartDate3] = useState(new Date(),); const [singleData, setSingleData] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { jobDB.filter((data) => { if (data.Id === id) { setSingleData(data) } return 0; }) }, [id]); const handleChange = date => { setStartDate(date) }; const handleChange1 = date => { setStartDate1(date) }; const handleChange2 = date => { setStartDate2(date) }; const handleChange3 = date => { setStartDate3(date) }; return (
{singleData.job_name}

{singleData.job_area} && {singleData.job_city}

Personal Details
Birth Date
Your Education
Degree Level:*
Your Experience
Position:*
Upload Your Files
 ); }; export default JobApply;
